comment.text: This translation key is used for the caption of a custom login button, which allows users to customize the label displayed on the login form. It appears as part of an SSO settings page and can be translated to provide a localized label for this feature.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تخصيص تسمية زر تسجيل الدخول' is a literal translation of 'Custom login button caption'. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like 'عنوان زر تسجيل دخول مخصص' or 'وصف زر تسجيل الدخول المخصص'. The original English phrase implies a caption or label for a custom button, and the Arabic translation is more of a description of a customized login button itself.

The translation "Fərdi giriş düyməsinin başlığı" is a literal translation of 'Custom login button caption'. While understandable, it's a bit clunky. A more natural-sounding translation for a button caption would focus on the action the button performs. It lacks the 'Custom' flavor.

The translation 'Vlastní titulek přihlašovacího tlačítka' is a very literal translation of 'Custom login button caption'. It's grammatically correct, but less natural sounding in Czech. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'Vlastní popis tlačítka pro přihlášení' or 'Popis vlastního tlačítka pro přihlášení'.

The translation 'Mukautetun sisäänkirjautumispainikkeen teksti' is overly literal and verbose. While technically correct, it doesn't convey the brevity and clarity expected for a button caption. 'Custom login button caption' implies a simple label for the button itself.
The translation is quite long and might be truncated on smaller screens or button sizes. A shorter caption is preferable.

The translation 'Հատուկ մուտքի կոճակի վերնագիր' is too literal. 'Custom login button caption' implies a label or text for a custom login button. A more natural translation would emphasize that aspect. 'Տարածված մուտքի կոճակի լեյբլ' or 'Հատուկ մուտքի կոճակի լեյբլ' would be more appropriate.

The translation "ຄຳບັນຍາຍປຸ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບແບບກຳນົດເອງ" is a literal translation and may be overly verbose for a button caption. It could be shortened for better usability. While technically correct, it's not ideal for a button label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a shorter, more user-friendly option like "ປຸ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບກຳນົດເອງ" or "ປຸ່ມເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບແບບກຳມ້າງ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pielāgots pieteikšanās pogas paraksts' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the essence of 'Custom login button caption'. It's a bit clunky. A more natural-sounding translation might be better.

The translation 'Legenda dos botões personalizados para iniciar sessão' is too literal and verbose for a button caption. It doesn't convey the core meaning concisely. 'Legenda' isn't ideal for a button caption.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise and user-friendly option like 'Botão Personalizado' or 'Login Personalizado'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Button captions are usually short and impactful. The current translation is quite long and might be truncated or difficult to read on smaller screens.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prioritize brevity. A shorter caption is preferable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Etichetă de buton de conectare particularizată' is a literal translation that might sound awkward in Romanian. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing. 'Particularizată' implies customization, which might not always be the intended meaning. A more fluent translation might be needed depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Text buton conectare personalizat' or 'Descriere buton conectare personalizat' depending on the exact UI element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Пользовательская надпись для кнопки входа:' is overly literal and not idiomatic. It translates to 'Custom caption for the login button:' which sounds awkward in Russian. A more natural phrasing would be needed.

The translation "අභිරුචි පිවිසුම් බොත්තමේ ශ්‍රීර්ෂය" (abiruchi pivisum bottame shreeshay) is a literal translation but doesn't convey the meaning of 'Custom login button caption' naturally in Sinhala. It reads as 'Custom entry button's header'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "අභිරුචි ලොග් බොත්තම් පදනය" (abiruchi log bottam padanya) which translates to 'Custom login button text/caption' or "අභිරුචි පිවිසුම් බොත්තම් ටීඨිල්ල" (abiruchi pivisum bottam teetiyalla) - 'Custom login button title'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Прилагођена ознака дугмета за пријављивање' is quite literal and a bit clunky. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. A more natural phrasing might convey the meaning more effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise and natural translation like 'Прилагођено дугме за пријаву' or 'Корисничко дугме за пријаву'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Prilagođena oznaka dugmeta za prijavljivanje" is a bit literal and verbose. A more natural and concise translation would improve readability and user experience. "Custom login button caption" doesn't necessarily need to be translated as "oznaka dugmeta".
The translation 'Özel oturum açma düğmesi başlığı' is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Turkish. 'Başlığı' (caption) is redundant.

The translation 'Налаштовуваний надпис на кнопці входу' is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Ukrainian. 'Custom login button caption' implies a label for a custom button used for login, not the properties of the button itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Приклад: 'Текст на кнопці користувача' or 'Підпис на кнопці користувача'. A better translation would focus on the label/text displayed on the custom login button, not describe the button's customizability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Chú thích nút đăng nhập tùy chỉnh' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'caption'. 'Caption' refers to the text displayed *on* the button. A more natural translation would imply that, like 'Văn bản trên nút đăng nhập tùy chỉnh'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Văn bản trên nút đăng nhập tùy chỉnh
